$WmMPID_エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Normal,Face|Green army! Your preparations had
better be complete. This may be a
mock battle, but let's give it our all!$k$p$WmMPID_ヒーニアス,ch08_03_Heanius_M_Normal,Face|I won't suffer a defeat at his hands,
blue army. You had best follow my
strategies very, very closely.$k$p$WmMPID_リオン,ch08_12_Lyon_M_Normal,Face|I apologize in advance, red army, for
any deficiencies in my leadership... I
can promise I'll give it my all.$k$p
